snippet: President Obama cited the city’s successful gun violence prevention efforts, even as evidence mounted that expanded background checks on sales may emerge as a compromise.
abstract: Pres Obama cites successful gun violence prevention efforts in Minneapolis, even as evidence mounts that expanded background checks on sales may emerge as compromise.
lead_paragraph: President Obama cited the city’s successful gun violence prevention efforts, even as evidence mounted that expanded background checks on sales may emerge as a compromise.

headline.seo: In Minneapolis, Obama Presses Case for Tougher Gun Laws
headline.main: Obama Presses for Gun Measures, Offering Up Minneapolis as a Model
headline.print_headline: Obama Presses for Gun Measures, Offering Up Minneapolis as a Model
